definition: a trip taken by an official at public expense, partake in a feast or banquet
details:
noun
- a trip taken by an official at public expense
- a journey taken for pleasure
= synonyms: jaunt, outing, pleasure trip, sashay, expedition, excursion
- dessert made of sweetened milk coagulated with rennet
verb
- partake in a feast or banquet
= synonyms: feast, banquet
- provide a feast or banquet for
= synonyms: feast, banquet
- go on a pleasure trip
